code: import{ADD_TO_CART}from'../constants/actionTypes';var totalprice=function totalprice(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_TO_CART:return parseFloat(state)+parseFloat(action.cartProduct.price);default:return parseFloat(state);}};export default totalprice;
